Module WitchHunt

Package fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.interactions

package fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.interactions
Classes in this package are in charge of passing information based on user-input gathered from the view to the model, while making sure to keep these two levels independent of each other
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    fr.sos.witchhunt.controller
    'Controller' level of the application's MVC architecture. Contains classes the roles of which are :
    fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.core
    Contains the application's core classes, those that are in charge of initializing every core and common component, and of controlling the execution flow.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CardSelectorController
    Gathers user-input from an instance of DeckPanel (internal class of GamePanel) active on the Graphical User Interface.
    ChoicesPanelController
    Gathers user-input from an instance of ChoicesPanel active on the Graphical User Interface.
    DeckSelectorButtonController
    Gather user-input from a DeckSelectorButton of a DeckSelectorPanel (internal classes of GamePanel) active on the Graphical User Interface.
    Menu
    Represents a menu with a title and plural choices.
    PlayerCreatorController
    Gathers user-input from an instance of PlayerCreatorPanel active on the Graphical User Interface.
